name: KSO6 - A Hot Dog Story
description:
KSO6 Corporation presents :
A Hot Dog Game

In your quest for fatness, Hot-Dogs and burgers are your allies !

If you encounter a tomato though, do NOT ... EVER ... eat it.

The rule is simple my friend:

The more you eat, the better !

-------------------------------------------

Basic rules :

- Hot-Dogs +1 score (+ potential money)

- Burgers +1 life (+ $5 if you are full life)

- Tomato -1 life

When losing, a third of your score is given to you as cash

Shop bonuses :

- Speed Run faster

- More money Better chance to get money for every Hot-Dog

- Better Score Improves score for every Hot-Dogs

Controls (Windows) :

- Left-arrow Run left
- Right-arrow Run right

Controls (Android) :

Scroll your thumb through the screen to move either way

Made by :

Guillaume DEMAY
Romain HEDOUIN
Benjamin HENRY
Ludovic BARRETEAU
Antoine JAHAN
